node.text: Our Virtual Skillet 6 Ways event where we discussed all things Skillet and its variants

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @blackpearlfarms. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Lost with the passage of time. Embraced by the distant glow of years past. 

The Fortress of Immaculate Thought. A Barrel-Aged Golden Sour Ale with Blueberries. This year, we set out to capture the beauty of the dark fruit which blankets our mountainsides and blended them upon beautiful golden sour ale, allowing the fruit to not conflict with darker, more complex malt, and being vulnerable to showcasing its raw spice and wild character. This golden ale was brewed with local raw wheat and barley and brewed with house-aged Hallertauer hops before sitting in neutral red and white wine barrels for over a year. We aged the beer for several months with 1,200 pounds of @blackpearlfarms blueberries from Branchville, South Carolina. The beer was then bottle conditioned and released with youth on its side. Immerse yourself in pools of tropical berry smoothie and fresh harvest Beaujolais shrouded in clouds of hindu kush. 500ml/$17. 7%.

Bottles release today at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be today from 2-8pm and 9/4 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 9/2 at 12pm. The tethers of our past learnings shall bleed us dry. And so that, we must lay to rest.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @hopheadfarms. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
We are tiny vibrations in our world’s hallowed tale. So we must embrace the savagery of our ends

Storied Relics of Deaths Certain Path. A Double India Pale Ale with Fresh Hops. The farmers at @hopheadfarms annually load a truck at midnight with freshly-picked cones and head South to make this fine ale. Dry-hopped with more than 25 pounds per barrel (not an error) of wet Chinook and Cashmere hops. The end result is a bountiful display of indica tincture, pineapple skins, limeade, matcha smoothie, and honeydew candy. 4pk/$20. 8.2%.

Cans will release on 9/1 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 9/1 from 2-8pm and 9/4 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 9/2 at 12pm. For those who meander into the awakening of dual perspective shall forever inherit the gift of perpetual erudition.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @riverbendmalt, @garageproject, and @phantasm.nz. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
Our voices lay scattered among the hidden frequencies all around us. 

The Paranormal Electricity of Trans-Pacific Airwaves. An India Pale Ale with Buddha Hand and Phantasm. Made in a world where we travel as particles of data as a means of staying connected. And a way to explore the essence of the South Pacific with our friends at @phantasm.nz and @garageproject. Made from pale barley, malted oats and @riverbendmalt rye. Whirlpooled with a massive charge of new harvest Phantasm powder, a pure thiol bomb that in combination with enzymes from a new experimental yeast produces massive tropical esters. Double dry-hopped with our select New Zealand Motueka and select Oregon Mosaic. Finished off with the fresh zest of Buddha’s Hand Citron. Teleport into jugs of topical berry skittles and strawberry jellies topped with lime sour patch kids. 4pk/$18. 7%. 

Cans will release on 9/1 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 9/1 from 2-8pm and 9/4 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 9/2 at 12pm. For the moment, this is our dwelling. And until the passage of blowing winds, airborne we remain, as mere particles of a greater existence.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @hudsonvalleybrewery, @frenchbroadchocolate, and @seycoffee. May be an image of bottle.

node.text:
The days have passed, and so has perspective. 

Lessons in Solitude: Portrait II. An Imperial Stout with Blood Orange Zest, Cocoa Nibs, Sey Coffee, Toasted Oats, and Vanilla Bean. A second depicture of a state of being with our friends at @hudsonvalleybrewery. This stout was our first dabbling in the production of alcohol outside our legal bounds, tempered back with lower alcohol and well-aged Imperial Stout to concoct a beautiful array of depth right at the legal line. We then aged the beer upon @frenchbroadchocolate Nicaraugan Cocoa Nibs, Sidama-grown Ethiopian Landrace coffee beans from @seycoffee in Brooklyn, house-toasted oats, Madagascar vanilla bean and fresh zest of blood oranges. An amalgamation of citrus pastry cream inside chocolate ganache, served aside blood orange galette with a soft serve swirl cone. 500ml/$20. 15%. 

Bottles and Portrait II tees will release on 9/1 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 9/1 from 2-8pm and 9/4 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 9/2 at 12pm. And yet, when we steep in the mirth of our very mortal treasures, we shall be forever enlightened to the portal of grand opportunity. More on the way.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @jlriles, @creepycrawdaddy, @adml.spaceship, @crypticbrewer, and @jmcguire65. May be an image of 2 people, drink and indoor.

node.text:
A brief pause for recognition of very great accomplishments.

We'll be closing our AVL taproom at 3pm tomorrow (8/29) to cheers with our fellow crew members over some well deserved staff hangs. This staff works their asses off, around the clock, to put out the Burial experience we all know and love. Time to give them some due props. 

But don't fret, Brunch & Beats will will still go down from 12pm - 2:30pm. And normal hours will be in full swing on Monday. Come hang with us and cheers to the weekend.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of 1 person and brick wall.

node.text:
The current of the past, carried by the momentum of the future. Be our guide.

Construction is underway at @burialclt House of Relics. As are plans for a hell of a Grand Opening. And you know it wouldn't be a party without a little gift to the Charlotte crowd. So tell us which imbibe you want to drink that day. 

Drop us a riff in the comments and let us know what grog should flow from our taps when we unveil the new digs. This dude wants to know. Cheers.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @creaturecomfortsbeer, and @epiphanycraftmalt. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
The rhythmic tides of tradition. Our most excellent time of the year.

Culture Keepers. A Festbier Lager. An annual celebration of the everlasting splendor of beer's beginnings. Our traditional German-style festbier was first brewed in 2017 with our good friends at @creaturecomfortsbeer, who share our dedication to honoring those who came before us as brewers. So we bring it back each year. This year we worked with @epiphanycraftmalt to import barley from Germany, malted to our specific requirements, so that Festbier could continue to be a 100% craft malt expose. Break into warm loaves of crusty sourdough with toffee walnut glaze and a misting of golden honey. 4pk/$14. 5.8%.

Collaborations. Connectivity. Culture. As our breweries have grown over the years, it is the staff members who hold the key. The Keepers of our Cultures. Collaborations are no longer about a small group of people connecting. They are no longer about just beer. Collaborations are an opportunity for a wider group of people to join forces and learn from one another. It’s a time for deeper understanding.

$10 FLAT RATE SHIPPING is back this Thursday (8/26) on all orders over $100. Cans and new Festbier Tankard release today at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be today from 2-8pm and 8/28 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 8/26 at 12pm. Raise a liter in the name of the craft malt revolution. Prost.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink and text that says 'BURIAL BURIAL'.

node.text:
For we too shall one day meet doom. 

The Shadow of Our Final Days. A Triple India Pale Ale. The final tale of our 2019 Dissection Series is back. Made with Oats and Candy Syrup. Triple Dry-Hopped with Riwaka, Galaxy, Citra, Eldorado and Amarillo Cryo. Cones of tutti frutti ice cream rolled in tangerine candy dust and topped in mango passionfruit syrup. 4pk/$21. 10%.
 
$10 FLAT RATE SHIPPING is back this Thursday (8/26) on all orders over $100. Cans will release on 8/25 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 8/25 from 2-8pm and 8/28 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 8/26 at 12pm. We are all at odds with the passage of time. But let us not be entombed in nascent visions of the past.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of food and drink.

node.text:
Awakened by the pall of darkness. The welcoming pulse of righteousness. 

Empire of Eternal Nothingness. An Imperial Stout with Toasted Coconut, Bourbon Vanilla and Double Dipped in Cocoa Nibs. Two long years ago, when freedom triumphed and the times were hellacious, we started the newest chapter of our stout program with a beer so appropriately named Realm of Absolute Nothingness. It bore a darkened ominous hole into the depths of our willingness to go the extra distance. At the time, it was story that had no plan, rules or boundaries. And its final destination was forged upon abundant tangents and ruminations. This is the resurrection, rebirth, and recompense, all in one. The amalgamation of two years of hypothesizing, stumbling and eventually acheiving. 

This is our 6 hour stout base, turned up to 15% ABV, and aged upon a double dipping of select @frenchbroadchocolate cocoa nibs, Madagascar vanilla bean, and the largest swath of macaroon coconut ever to touch our steel. Gooey coconut clusters, topped with molten mounds bars, and shoved into the center of a German chocolate cake soaked in rummy goodness. 500ml/$19. 15%.

Bottles will release on 8/25 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 8/25 from 2-8pm and 8/28 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 8/26 at 12pm. Awash in the pit of endless despair. More on the way.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @hudsonvalleybrewery. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
When we examine our existence, we stand among a baffling queue on the road to certain death. 

Lessons in Solitude: Portrait I. An India Pale Ale with Grape Juice and Honey. A series of movements with our friends at @hudsonvalleybrewery. A fine base of barley and oats, co-fermented with 15% fresh Sauvignon Blanc juice and then finished with local honey. Double dry-hopped with Vic Secret, Nelson, Enigma, and Citra Cryo. Settle into scoops of honeysuckle sorbet dosed with papaya lime jolly ranchers and a mist of white wine. 4pk/$19. 7.3%.

For our shippers, $10 FLAT RATE SHIPPING on all orders over $100 is back this Thursday (8/26). Cans and Portrait I tees will release on 8/25 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 8/25 from 2-8pm and 8/28 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 8/19 at 12pm. As Unknown As Divination. This portrait, we offer you.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink and text that says 'BURIAL'.

node.text:
All the while, we wondered what laid beyond it. For we were only meant to be passengers.

The World is Not My Home. A Barrel-Aged Golden Sour Ale with Balaton Cherries. A surprise gift for all you shippers out there. This well-aged sour ale is born of several homes. A selection of 3 different one-year Golden Sour Ales from our taproom puncheons was blended with barrels of three-year Brown Sour Ale to forge a complex array of fruit esters. 

We brought in 1000# of Michigan-grown Balaton cherries and allowed them to ferment in their skins through carbonic maceration, before racking the beer atop of the fruit and wine. After co-fermentation of several months, the beer was bottle conditioned. Fork off a bite of cherry handpie, with lemon pastry cream, over a tall glass of young Nebbiolo. 500ml/$18. 6%.

Bottles are available now at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms and for limited shipping. You have 5 days to snag bottles from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be 8/21 from 12-4pm. No distro. All fantasy. No druthers. All aura. Come hang with us.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
A faint glimpse of the aura within. Projected upon the soul of distortion. 

Postmodern Depictions of Natural Phenomena. A Double India Pale. A re-read of one of our favorite chapters in the book of Heavy Resin. Double Dry-Hopped with Mosaic and Mosaic Cryo, and hefty doses of 2020 hand-selected Strata, Idaho Gem and Motueka. Dip into slices of whipped key lime pie, fistfuls of pineapple jolly ranchers and pillows of blueberry kush. 4pk/$19. 8.5%.

Cans release today at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be today from 2-8pm and 8/21 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 8/19 at 12pm. Thrive within the realm of innate existence.
